captions.text: One Beer !
You pay the bill Sir, only then Beer !
Is it ?
Okay ! I'll quit ! I'll quit coming here, I am extremely hurt.
Is this for me ?
Cheers !
What boss ? Are you newly drinking ?
I got you...

You're here alone ! Ordered yourself a drink !
& you're not used to drinking too...
...that means, there's some matter !
Did you fail in love ?

If you tell your story,
 I will give you ideas to get rid of your love matter...
First tell me what has happened ?
Okay listen...
Again power cut !

Hey why're you so tensed ?
Neha is not answering the call since morning !..
...I am tensed & wonder what has happened !

Hello Neha !  
- Hmm.. Ashwin ! Tell !

What wrong with you ? I've called you many times since morning,
& am very much tensed.
Actually my mood is not good.
Any problem with your family ?
Nothing as such ashwin, mood is not good, that's it...
...It's okay !... but did you have food ?
Yes I did !..   & you ?

I din't Ashwin, mood is not good, 
& I don't feel like having anything.

What Neha ? You say your mood ain't good & din't have anything too,
What about your health if you be like this ?
Tell Neha ! Swear on me Neha !
Nothing much ! I feel like seeing you all the time..
..you'll be at work, I don't feel like disturbing you...

..But I want to see you, 
that's why I've asked my father to get me an I-phone 6..

Do you know why ? I can take 100 photos of yours & 
just keep watching them in a slide show.

Common Neha ! Why do you get upset on small issues ?
& moreover you don't anwer my calls..
Common Ashwin ! No more advices !
Leave all that ! You're getting ready & coming out with me now..

Hey ! Mom is coming !   - Hello ! Hello ! Hello !
- Bye ! Bye ! Bye ! Bye !  - Neha !
Look what I've expected is correct, she is depressed !
Is it ? You could've shared her pain !
Yes why not ! Who other than me will do it ?
That's all okay ! Do you've 35000 rs with you ?

Bro ! You gifted her an I-phone yesterday !
What did she give you ?

What gift ! She's still in pain. 
Anyhow where are you ?
That's great !.. Did not your mom say anything ?

I too did the same !
- Hey ! Is that a new phone ?

Ya ! 
- Nice ! When did you get this ?

I purchased it yesterday ! How is it ?
 - Very good !

Someone's call !   - Who is it ?
- Some Ashwin !
It's a waste call.. Cut it off !

How to cut the call ?
- I'll show you... like this !..
This one ! It'll disconnect if you press this.

Hey.. who is this ?
- I am that waste caller !
I am Saketh ! I am her boyfriend.
What is the relation between you both ?

Relation ? You'll also be in my position some day !
I gave I-phone 5 & you give I-phone 6.
You'll be in my position the moment I-phone 6 is launched.
How many phones will you change ?
Are you hurt just for this ? & decided to have a drink ?...
..You're very sensitive brother !

Not only for that ! Anyhow she cheated me !
But I found a true love this time.
One more story ? Bro... One more beer !.. You carry on...!
As I am very sensitive, I loved very much this girl too.
This time it's two side love ! & do you know how we broke up ?
Possesiveness !
Hello Mother ! Good news ! I've got good results in the exam !..

No more foriegn universities are required,
I'll get a good ceat here itself.
Mom ! Mom ! I'll call you back later !

Hi Swati !   - Whom're you speaking to ?
- To my mom !

To your mom ?    - Yes !
 - Do you speak for so long with your mom ?

I don't believe you !
- I was really speaking to my mom.

I swear on you !
- You always swear on me so easily..
.. But I don't trust you.

I was really speaking to my mom ! Shall I put her in conference ?
Will you atleast believe then ?

It's okay !    - Do you know that our results are declared ?
- Yes I know !
Do you know how much I scored ?
You may guess.
I've got 70 % !

Is it ? Congrats ! 
- Thank you ! How much did you score ?
I've got 85 %.
Hey ! Won't you greet me ? Are you not happy ?

Hello !   Hello ! 
- What ! Do you truly love me or not ?
What ?   - I got 70 % by thinking about you & you got 85 %...
So... That means I love you more than you do to me !

What're you talking ?
- You din't remember me even once while studying ! Is it ?
That means you're not thinking about me at all.

Am I the mad person here ?
- Common Swati ! what're you speaking ?

Tell me one thing.., how much did you score in tenth ?
- Now why all that ?
You got 70 % & I got 90 %. And in intermediate ?

I dont remember !   
- It's 75 % ! And I got 95 %.
I was better than you in studies till you met me..

I scored less since I've made you fat.
- What relation does it have ?
It has. You just keep studying like you always do.
I am the one who made you fat & am not studying well too..
There's nothing as such Swati !    Hello Swati !  Hello ! Hello !

What're you doing Ashwin ? 
- Nothing much !
You know what.. I am going out for lunch with friends.

Won't you ask with whom ?
- With whom ?
Me, Preeti, Ramesh, Suresh, Ganesh, Mahesh & Kamesh !

And you aren't coming.
- It's Okay, Have fun !

One more thing ! We're going to tirupathi this evening,
with my nephew's & my family.

Any commitments ? Yes dad did.
- Okay ! You may go & return.

You should not call me these 4 days, dad's going to be there.
 - Okay !

You should not message me too, my nephew would be there.
 - That's Okay !

Is it Okay ?
- Yes ! It's Okay.

Okay ??
- Ya... Okay !
So, you're okay even if I go out with Ramesh & Suresh ?

Yaa Okay ! - You're okay even if I go with my nephew family !
& you're also okay if I don't be in touch with you !

You're okay if I ask you not to call me ! Everything is okay to you !
- Ya okay ! You would be in problem if I call you in your dad's presence.

What all I told is a lie.
- What is it ? Why did you lie to me ?

I know you don't like me !
- Now with what sense are you speaking ?

Then what ! You're not possesive even if I go out with boys ?
- You don't even miss me while I am not here for 4 days...
You don't care at all even if I am out for 4 days...
It not make any difference wether I am alive or not !

I do not think you love me !
- No Swathi ! I trust you & that's why I cannot be possessive.
I understand & thought you would be in problem if I call !

Nothing as such ! Do you know what would I feel if you go out with girls ?
I feel like killing you !
I'll go mad if I don't see you for 4 days !

You've no idea how much will I suffer if you're not in touch with me.
- There's nothing as such, you're misunderstanding me !

No ! Don't say anything ! - Swathi !
I am not going to listen ! - Swathi !

You don't love me ! - Swathi !
You don't listen to me - Listen to me Swathi !

I got it very well !  - Listen to me Swathi !
 - So...   Break up !
What a sadism ! This is not possesiveness, it's called sadism !
She is possesive towards me, & what I've for her is belief...
We got seperated as I couldn't understand it.
Girls are very strange brother ! Aren't they ?
That's why brother ! I am loving myself instead of loving someone else !
Gym... Titanic... & what not I've concentrated on !
After I did problems've raised even more !
What ! One more love story ! Then one more beer ! You tell !
Ya.. we've started & will be there in an hour, bye !
Hi Shruti ! Shall we go ?

Why've you come like this ?
- Why ? What has happened ?
Is your pant & shirt matching at all ?
This is style !   - Your face ! & what is that ?
Lee ! - Will anyone wear a Lee shirt & a pepe pant together ?
You should wear a tommy shirt. Whom are you going to meet ?

Friends ! I've praised you in front of my friends...
& you've come like you've no dress sense.
You've to be perfect to be beside me !

Ashwin ! I am not comfortable.  Go change & get back !
- What ? Do you know where my house is ?
I don't know that all. You've to get back here in 10 mins. Go !
Go.. change & get back !
Is it okay now ? - Yes ! How perfect you look now !

Which brand is your shoe ?  - Reebok !
 - Okay lets go !
Hi bro ! How are you ? & What're you doing here ?

Oh you're going out with shruti ! Please give me 1000 rs, 
I will return it back !
Thanks bro ! Enjoy !

Who is that extra fellow ?
 - It's Ravi !
I don't like these kind of people ! Cut your friendship with him.

What're you saying ? He's my childhood friend.
What did he do by the way ?
I don't know all that ! I don't like you talking to him.
Give me one reason.
I don't like. Isn't this enough ?

But he's very good guy... 
still give me one more reason to break our friendship.
I did not like his face !
Face ? Will anyone break friendship if they do not like the face ?
Look ! Now you've started arguing with me for him !
Okay ! Okay ! Cut ! Cut ! I'll not speak to him anymore !
Okay fine ! Then call him & say that you're not going to talk to him !

I told you right ! 
- No ! No ! No ! Speak to him.
Speak !

Hi bro.. what's up ?
- Nothing much. From today we're not going to speak to each other.

Our friendship ends from now on.
- Why bro ? What happened bro ?

I din't like your face.
- You din't like my face ? !
I din't like your face ! Your speech ! & I hate your dressing sense !
What're you speaking ? What's wrong with you ?
Say that you hate him ! Say it !

I hate you ! I hate you ! I hate you !
 - I hate you ???
I love you dear !

What're you doing ?
I am deleting Ravi's number !
What ? Are you sad that you lost friendship with Ravi.

Nothing as such !
- Then why are you so silent ?
Actually I am thinking what to speak.
You were never so calm since I've met you.

Nothing like that !
- Then why aren't you even laughing ?

No ! You're acting as if you're laughing.
- No ! No ! I am actually laughing !

No ! You laughed becoz I've asked you to.
- There's nothing as such.
You're still thinking of your friend !
No ! I am not thinking about him !

No ! You are thinking !
- No ! Promise !
What is this smell ? Did you smoke a cigarette ?

Stop ! Stop the car !
 - What ?

Do you realise where we are !
- I don't care wherever we are, just stop the car !

Cool ! Cool !   - I hate smokers in cars !
- I've a mouth freshner, I'll eat that !

Stop ! Please stop the car !  - Please Shruti ...!
- I said stop the car !
Shruti ! Please Shruti !... You won't get even autos here !
Shruti ! Please Shruti ! Shruti !
Thanks bro for giving me money !
I should thank you for returning me money !
Bro.. It's your girlfriend !

Go from here ! Go !
 - Okay ! Okay !
Shruti ! Hi ! Did you recognize me ? I am Ravi 's childhood friend !
Bye !
Hi Shruti ! He was here just to give money ! That's it !

Are you still lying to me ?
- No Shruti ! He was here just to give money !
I told you 100 times that not to speak to him !...

Stop talking ! How much you've tortured me ?
- You've got my shirt changed as you did not like it !...

Listen to me !  - What ! Shirt wasn't comfortable to you !
I am the one who is wearing so it must be comfortable to me !...

You make me loose my childhood friends ! 
Only because you din't like his face !

You also deleted his number !   -  Ashwin ...!
- Stop it ! Don't speak at all !..
You left me on road because I smoked a cigarette...
Did I ask you to smoke ? Or did I smoke in the car ?

Is it wrong if I smoke in my car ?... 
Is it wrong to help my friend ?...
Those're not wrong ! In fact, me loving you is the biggest mistake !

Look ! You're not even repenting for it.   - Listen to me..
 - Just leave ! Leave !
I will not leave you if I get to see you anywhere around !
And you call this Love ? !!!

So, You got to know wht's a girl charecter is...
 only after 3 of them left you ?
No bro ! It's injustice to say that all girls would be like them.
Some of them're angels ! May be I am at fault.

Non-sense ! What else need to be done ?..
I would say people like me're correct to these girls.
Just fulfill your needs when required & just leave them !
And yes, Girls are here just to fulfill needs not to love them.

It's because of people like you... we're losing trust
on boys & love too..
Even good lovers get spoiled if they be with you..
If I find you again speaking about love ...!
Actually, I was listening to your past sitting beside you..
It's the mistake of the girls who left you & not yours...

if you don't mind... may I say something to you ?
 - Yes !

I Love you !
 - What !
We can start being friends first...
In case if you like... we can start the relation..

I am Pooja ! 
 - I am Ashwin !

Shall we go ?
 - Ya sure !
Actually I am a software engineer...!
What ? Are you here to hit me ?

I am here to thank you !
 - But for what ?

I will've to tell you one more story to make you understand !
 - One more story ?
I am a regular customer to this bar...
My day starts with a Beer !...
Similarly, I've started today's day with a beer...
Suddenly I saw an angel...
I got excited after looking at her !
My high got spoiled too..
I wanted to make friends with her.

Meanwhile... she got a call !
- Hello !...   How easily he cheated me !..
I remained silent even if he loved someone else being with me.
I believed all his lies !..

I din't believe you even when you said
 that he loved my money & not me !

In the name of possesiveness he tortured me so much & 
showed sadism, & still I remained calm...
He asked me to join for B.A. as he was also took the same stream...
And I did join for his sake even if I did not like to...
I also changed my habbits & myself & my dressing sense too...
At the last he left me saying I am not correct to him.
I've decided to get her after listening to her break up story...
Meanwhile... I got an idea !
And realised that I required a fool too..
And I found you !
I remained silent even if he loved somone else being with me.
In the name of possesiveness he tortured me very much !
I also changed my habbits & myself & my dressing sense too...
That means, you've created a story utilising her situation !
That also means your story is all fake !
Is that it !
